General.Name: SA Catana Group
General.Description: SA Catana Group manufactures and sells pleasure boats, sails, and motors in France and internationally. It also offers boat work, garage rentals, guarding, and berth services. The company markets its products under the CATANA, BALI, and CATSPACE brands. SA Catana Group was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Canet-en-Roussillon, France.
General.Address: Zone Technique du port, Canet-en-Roussillon, France, 66140

1.Name: David  Etien
1.Title: Chief Financial Officer and Head of Investor Relations
